metadata.title: CVE-2020-11025 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In affected versions of WordPress, a cross-site scripting (XSS)vulnerability in the navigation section of Customizer allows JavaScriptcode to be executed. Exploitation requires an authenticated user. This hasbeen patched in version 5.4.1, along with all the previously affectedversions via a minor release (5.3.3, 5.2.6, 5.1.5, 5.0.9, 4.9.14, 4.8.13,4.7.17, 4.6.18, 4.5.21, 4.4.22, 4.3.23, 4.2.27, 4.1.30, 4.0.30, 3.9.31,3.8.33, 3.7.33).

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
